thread.title: Today’s Bay Area arts and entertainment picks, Oct. 7
thread.title_full: Today’s Bay Area arts and entertainment picks, Oct. 7 - SFGate

author: sfgate.com
title: Today’s Bay Area arts and entertainment picks, Oct. 7
text:
Garbage: The band, fronted by Shirley Manson and featuring Nirvana producer Butch Vig , is on tour to mark the 20th anniversary of its self-titled debut, which features the hits “Stupid Girl” and “Only Happy When It Rains.” 8 p.m. Wednesday, Oct. 7. Fox Theater , Oakland. www.ticketmaster.com 
“Fred’s Diner”: Dark and unsettling surprises are on the menu in the American premiere of Penelope Skinner ’s British roadside diner drama. 2:30 and 8 p.m. Wednesday, Oct. 7. Through Oct. 11. Magic Theatre , Fort Mason Center, S.F. (415) 441-8822. www.magictheatre.org.
